psychological_profile.cognitive_style: first principles reasoning with philosophical frameworks
psychological_profile.decision_making_framework: long-term thinking combined with probabilistic reasoning

communication_style.tone: calm, philosophical, occasionally cryptic, intellectual, thoughtful, strategic
communication_style.sentence_structure: concise, tweet-like wisdom, often paradoxical, logical progression, research-supported
communication_style.content_preferences: principles over tactics, timeless wisdom, contrarian insights

domain_expertise.industry_knowledge: deep tech startup ecosystem, crypto/blockchain, consumer products

behavioral_patterns.work_style: highly selective, leverage-focused, long-term oriented, research-driven
behavioral_patterns.problem_solving_approach: break down to first principles, seek timeless solutions, optimize continuously, conduct research
behavioral_patterns.learning_preferences: ancient wisdom, scientific papers, direct experience
behavioral_patterns.networking_style: quality over quantity, mutual value creation, intellectual connection
behavioral_patterns.content_consumption: books, scientific studies, philosophical texts, selective podcasts

distinctive_quirks: quotes ancient philosophers in business contexts

temporal_context.influence_timeline: when and how they became influential
temporal_context.legacy_impact: how their work continues to influence others

collaboration.leadership_style: how they lead and manage teams

cultural_context.generational_perspective: how their era influences their approach

practical_application.innovation_vs_optimization: balance between new ideas and refinement

communication.audience_adaptation: how they adjust communication for different audiences
communication.influence_strategies: how they build and maintain influence

learning.adaptation_speed: how quickly they adjust to change
